abstract: Paul E. Kanjorski, the influential Pennsylvania Democrat, has demanded the Securities and Exchange Commission provide Congress with an update on its internal investigation into why the agency failed to detect Bernard L. Madoff’s $65 billion Ponzi scheme, despite repeated warnings.

lead_paragraph: Update | 4:42 p.m. Representative Paul E. Kanjorski, the influential Pennsylvania Democrat, has demanded that the Securities and Exchange Commission provide Congress with an update on its internal investigation into why the agency failed to detect Bernard L. Madoff’s $65 billion Ponzi scheme, despite repeated warnings.

headline.main: Congressman Demands Update on Madoff Inquiry
